products.title: Bella Primrose Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Bella primrose roman blind in yellow/green. Made to measure from 26.40 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This floral window blind is perfect for bringing a pretty touch plus practical shading to a kitchen or a bedroom. Using a cotton blend fabric with delicate embroidery in fresh yellow and green tones, the bella primrose roman blind is an uplifting option that is bursting with charm and will suit a traditionally inspired interior.
 
 Product id: db-rom1052 fabric colour: primrose material: 52% polyester 48% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.   Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes

products.title: Rosabella Charcoal
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure rosabella charcoal deluxe roman blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality deluxe roman blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 350mm max width: 1250mm
 	min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm
 	fabric composition: 50% polyester / 50% cotton with polyester embroidery
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	controls: sidewinder control.
 	Fabric lining: fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available.
 	Fixings: fixing brackets included.
 	Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep.
 	Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro.
